From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"Skyburst welcome aboard." Pacifix said quickly, he then pulled out one
of his ice blasters. "Good work Crotale, but first we need to find out
who are the invaders, and the ones that need rescuing." He then noticed
the signal he got from Prowl. He quickly transformed, and hooked up to
his rear part, and drove towards the Maximal. "Come on, maybe he can
shed some light on the situation."
